title: 2022-03-21 - Facestealer Trojan Hidden in Google Play Plunders Facebook Accounts
plain_text:
# Facestealer Trojan Hidden in Google Play Plunders Facebook Accounts

**[threatpost.com/facestealer-trojan-google-play-facebook/179015/](https://threatpost.com/facestealer-trojan-google-play-facebook/179015/)**

## Subscribe to our Threatpost Today newsletter

Twitter

Microsoft Word also leveraged in the email campaign, which uses a 22-year-old Office RCE
bug. [https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx](https://t.co/pr5jq08fPx)
